Test.TestName: EVENT-3-1-23 REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: PullMessage response with delay
Test.Description: Set Message Timeout to 5 s. Set Operation delay to 60s Check that thet test tool will wait for PM response in 60s Check that step 5 will not be used (via 'Get Current Result' button in a brouser)

Test.TestName: EVENT-3-1-23 REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: Fault to Unsubscribe
Test.Description: DUT sends fault to Unsubscribe request Check that Test tool will not wait while termination time is expaired

Test.TestName: EVENT-3-1-23 REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
Test.Name: PullMessage response with long delay
Test.Description:
PullMessages Timeout = 25 days Check that the test tool sends PM request with timeout=25 days 20 s The test tool shall wait response during Message Timeout
Set Message Timeout to 30 s. Check that thet test tool will wait for PM response in 30s

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
EVENT-3-1-23 REALTIME PULLPOINT SUBSCRIPTION – PULLMESSAGES AS KEEP-ALIVE
STEP 1 - Get Event service address STEP PASSED
STEP 1 - Create Pull Point Subsciption Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that TerminationTime is specified STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Check if the DUT returned SubscriptionReference STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Check if SubscriptionReference contains address STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Check that URL specified is valid STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validating Current Time and Termination Time in CreatePullPointSubscription response STEP PASSED
Too large PullMessages timeout is specified. OTT can handle timeout about 24 days. OTT will send PullMessages request with specified timeout but will wait only for MessageTimeout to complete.
STEP 8 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done The HTTP request has exceeded the allotted timeout STEP FAILED
STEP 9 - Send Unsubscribe request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
TEST FAILED
